info.name: Abyss Tracker Conduit
info.description: An API interface for the Abyss Tracker

query.description: Fit hash to match (full match, lowercase, see https://github.com/molbal/abyss-tracker/wiki/Flexible-Fit-Hash)
If provided, only fits with historical relation to this will be displayed.
If provided, only the authenticated user's fits will be returned. If false, or not set, only public fits will be returned.

request.description: Lists all fits selectable by the authenticated user: public fits, incognito fits, and users' private fits. Cached for a minute.
Gets most data for a fit. Cached for a minute.
